Python Cellular Automata

Program for creating and recording colorful cellular automata that operate on an input image at each step. Parallel convolution implemented with CUDA provides fast performance on large arrays.

GitHub

Endless Tour

Tool for creating non-repeating 360 VR animations of any length using limited input frames from intersecting cameras.
